title: Executive Order 6083-Amendment of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules
content: Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules is hereby amended by the addition of a new subdivision and paragraph as follows:
1. One Secretary of the Federal Radio Commission.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6083-Amendment of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361917
